article:
There is a holiday next week and I can't decide what to do.I have a lot of work to do at home and this would be a good chance  to do it .But I don't like to spend the holiday in this way.I can work at home all the rest of the year.Last year I went north to the mountains. Everything there was beautiful,but it is too cold this time of the year.And it's really _ far to go for a short holiday.I decide _ this isn't a good time to go to the mountains.But I do want to go somewhere else.
Perhaps this would be a good chance to go to the beach .I like to go for walks _ the seashore _ the warm sunshine and watch the water.It's only eight miles and I will get there _ about two hours.After thinking it _ ,I am sure that this is a _ time for the seashore than the mountains .
